Dance music essentials

Enroll in our free masterclass and make your own EDM track in no time.

Enroll for free

In this masterclass

On the example of this reference track, which was created especially for this masterclass you will learn how to make a trendy, electronic dance track from scratch. After this 40 minutes master class, you’ll be able to produce your own music piece. We’ve designed this free masterclass for your to make your first step into EDM music production.

Level Basic
Software Ableton Live
Duration 40+ min
Enroll now

Who will teach you?

Hi, I’m Alexander Adamyan aka DROHP. I am a professional DJ and Music Producer with more than 12 years of experience in EDM music production. I’ve worked with various musicians and labels, played at more than 350 scenes including the famous Ibiza resort. I’ve produced over 120 ghost tracks for a lot of pop stars and some of them are worldwide hits. In this course I will guide you through all the basics of EDM production and share my tips and tricks to help you produce your next worldwide hit record.

Do you want more?

EDM production

In this online course you will learn the basics of EDM production, from music theory to mastering. Enroll to create fire-dance tracks right now.
